body:
So hey, i just wanted to show you what my friends found. Obviously they didn't find it first but yeah. If you want to watch it go ahead, if not its probably for the best.

PLEASE BE WARNED
There is the following: Adult/Mature language (swearing and other oddities)
and mass amounts of stupidity.
Also a volume warning.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ljZo_h3QMyw
 
Enjoy I suppose...

title: My Friends
